roleset.name: eat, use up

example.name: active
example.text: [The Miami fast-food chain, owned by Grand Metropolitan of Britain,]-1 expects *trace*-1 to consume roughly 34 million pounds of liquefied eggs annually.
example.arg: roughly 34 million pounds of liquefied eggs

example.name: passive, odd agent
example.text: While the vast bulk of it was indeed spent by reputable organizations on the good works it was raised for, it's equally true that [a sizable hunk]-1 was consumed *trace*-1 in ``expenses'' claimed by other operators, including fraudulent expenses.
example.arg: by `` expenses '' claimed by other operators , including fraudulent expenses

roleset.note: Frames file for 'consume' based on financial subcorpus; adjectival 'consuming' based on BOLT-4,5. Member of VNcls devour-39.4-1, consume-66.

example.name: Adjectival rel: consuming; concatenation of arg0
example.text: I too would buy a lace front wig if I did it but they 're so damn expensive and time consuming to put on .
